Class Problem

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Problem

  • public class Problem
extends java.lang.Object
    The class containing information about the problem.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Problem

        public Problem(int id,
               java.lang.String header,
               java.lang.String description,
               java.lang.String pre_conditions,
               java.lang.String post_conditions,
               int difficulty,
               boolean isTeacherProblem,
               java.util.List<Problem.Feature> features)
        Constructor for a problem object.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the problem.
        header - Function header of the problem.
        description - Description of the problem.
        pre_conditions - PreCondition solution of the problem.
        post_conditions - PostCondition solution of the problem.
        difficulty - Difficulty of the problem.
        isTeacherProblem - Whether the problem is a teacher problem.
        features - List of features the problem has.
